Class BasicContentTypeImageService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.content.impl.BasicContentTypeImageService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.sakaiproject.content.api.ContentTypeImageService

    public class BasicContentTypeImageService
extends Object
implements org.sakaiproject.content.api.ContentTypeImageService

    BasicContentTypeImage implements the ContentTypeImageService.

      • isUnknownType

        public boolean isUnknownType(String contentType)
        Is the type one of the known types used when the file type is unknown?
        Specified by:
        isUnknownType in interface org.sakaiproject.content.api.ContentTypeImageService
        Parameters:

        Returns:
